long_description: Crank Brothers Candy 11 pedals are redesigned for 2011. Not only do they have a refined look, fit and feel, they are stronger than ever. With 4 sides to choose from, pedal entry is easy and reliable; you'll click-in quicker than on any other pedal. Slim stack height provides excellent ground clearance; unique design and few moving parts allow reliable entry even when gunked up with mud. New titanium spindle is manufactured to pass European standards of quality and safety; you never need to worry about breaking the spindle. New spring design alleviates wing rattle, spring migration and breakage from fatigue. Aesthetic design features an aluminum CNC'd body with cast titanium wings. Pedals feature smooth-operating needle bearings. Watertight and airtight internal parts promote a long life and require little maintenance. Crank Brothers Candy 11 pedals have a 200 lb. rider weight limit. 6deg of soft float. Pedals should only be used with the Crank Brothers cleats (included) which will fit almost any SPD-compatible shoe.
